ygData.subject: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a flat broke minstrel of the 8th verse bound to Qeynos and I m wondering if it s worth my while to try to earn enough PP and make trek back to Kelethin to
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a flat broke minstrel of the 8th verse bound to Qeynos and I'm wondering
if it's worth my while to try to earn enough PP and make trek back to
Kelethin to purchase Kelin's Lament. I can't recall any of you more
experienced folks posting anything about how Lament has saved your life more
times than you can remember or wow'd your friends. Should I just start
saving up for Elemental Rhythms?

Also, what's the next step up from rusty/splintered weapons and is there
anyplace a bard my age can go to where she may loot them?

Peace
Evulia of Tunare
